title: Fragments of Lappish Mythology
description: The detailed book of Lappish or Sami mythology is a translation from Swedish of Lars Levi Laestadius's famous manuscript from 1840-1845 that was lost for many decades and was published in Swedish in 1997, and in Finnish in 2000. Translated by Börje Vähämäki
author: Lars Levi Laestadius
